full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG PHYOGS YUL BSRUNG LHA CHEN DGE BSNYEN CHEN PO 'JIGS MED DPA' BO DA YAN TIR KHI ZHES GRAGS PA'I ZHING SKYONG CHEN PO'I TSE THAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES LHA CHEN 'JIGS MED DPA' BO DA YAN TIR KHE ZHES GRAGS PA'I ZHING SKYONG CHEN POR TSE THAR 'BUL TSUL MU TIG DO SHAL CES BYA BA 'DI NI, LHA CHEN DE NYID LA TSE THAR PHUL SKABS, ,RANG GI 'DOD MOS DANG BSTUN DE, ,PAD DKAR 'CHANG SOGS SKYES CHEN DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS, DGE MTSAN BCU LDAN DE NYID BZHUGS KHANG PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I NYE CHAR SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
